basic.description:
A course which combines study of the history and theory of documentary film with the production of documentary videos. Requirements will include both research essays as well as the conceptualization and production of a documentary video or film.
NOTE    Students may enroll in no more than on production course per academic year: FILM 351/3.0; FILM 352/3.0; FILM 355/6.0; FILM 365/6.0; FILM 375/6.0; FILM 385/6.0; FILM 410/3.0; FILM 451/3.0; FILM 460/6.0.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Documentary Theory and Practice

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite   A GPA of 2.60 in FILM &[a grade of B- in FILM110 (or 104&106)&FILM250] & 6.0 units in FILM & reg in a FILM MAJ or MED Plan, or the Computer-Film (COFI) Subplan or STSC Spec Plan.
EXCLUSION    No more than 1 course from: FILM 355; FILM 360
